column2: it's very disappointing to hear that your whole meal was overseasoned. Our team aims to season our food in a way that highlights our delicious flavors and textures
column3: and it's hard to hear we missed the mark. I will share this input with our team so we can analyze how we can improve
column4: but it would help a great deal to learn when your reservation was as well. Please consider reaching out to Tina Majethia
